response.original_title: Patricia Kaas: Kaas chante Piaf à l'Olympia
response.overview: This magical concert took place at the Olympia in October 2013. For those who were lucky to be in the audience it was an opportunity to see and hear one of the greatest contemporary French singers pay homage to Edith Piaf.  Enjoy 21 songs of the great Piaf arranged by Abel Korzeniowski – « La Vie en Rose », « Milord », « L'Hymne à l'Amour » and «Non, je ne regrette rien » with a new mise en scène, this show is unique, visually and musically, promising you an emotional and moving evening. The performance of Patricia Kaas, the lights of the spectacle, the previously unpublished images of Piaf, make this concert extraordinary.
response.title: Patricia Kaas: Kaas chante Piaf à l'Olympia
